Author: Decker#3767
Content:
Agama can generate addresses / wifs from seed 2 different ways:

1. Same way as Iguana Core / Komodo ICO App.
2. With only SHA256(passphrase), as Bitcoin brain wallet.
3. BIP39 things, but seems we shouldn't count it in this puzzle.

So, only 1 and 2 remains. I checked it both ... "Solution + brain/heart"as passphrase doesn't give needed RMwxXySEWXmGAtianHv79pUNWamwTVb2zB address . I checked too many combinations ... but all are failed.
